register.name: CONFIG_FORMAT_MAJOR
register.caption: Configuration major version
register.description: The major version number of the configuration specification. Any change that is not backward-compatible will trigger a new major version.

register.name: CONFIG_FORMAT_MINOR
register.caption: Configuration minor version
register.description: The minor version number of the configuration specification. This number is increased every time something is added to the configuration.

register.name: CONFIG_FORMAT_BUILD
register.caption: Configuration build number
register.description: Build number of the configuration specification.

register.name: INSTANCE
register.caption: Content instance
register.description: The instance (version) of content

register.name: HARDWARE_MOD
register.caption: Hardware modification
register.description: Hardware modification bits

register.name: USB_ENUMERATION
register.caption: USB Enumeration
register.description: Select which USB interfaces are enumerated in the composite USB device.

value.name: HID

register.name: MSD_SETTINGS
register.caption: Mass storage settings
register.description: Used to determine the configuration of the MSD file system and file content

value.name: DEFAULT
value.caption: Default settings
value.description: Default setup

value.name: IOT_GOOGLE
value.caption: Settings for Google IOT boards
value.description: IOT GOOGLE kit, two extra files with the public key and google cloud links

register.name: TARGET_DEBUG_INTERFACES
register.caption: Program/debug interfaces
register.description: Program / Debug interface select bits on the debugger.

value.description: Do not report the SWD interface as available.
Report the SWD interface as available.
Do not report the JTAG for ARM interface as available.
Report the JTAG for ARM interface as available.
Do not report the JTAG for AVR interface as available.
Report the JTAG for AVR interface as available.
Do not report the aW interface as available.
Report the aW interface as available.
Do not report the dW interface as available.
Report the dW interface as available.
Do not report the PDI interface as available.
Report the PDI interface as available.
Do not report the ISP interface as available.
Report the ISP interface as available.
Do not report the UPDI interface as available.
Report the UPDI interface as available.
Do not report the TPI interface as available.
Report the TPI interface as available.
Do not report the SWO interface as available.
Report the SWO interface as available.
Do not report the ICSP interface as available.
Report the ICSP interface as available.

register.name: TARGET_DEBUG_FEATURES
register.caption: Program/debug features
register.description: Feature select bits on the debugger.

value.description: Do not report a suggested target microcontroller.
Report a suggested target microcontroller.
Programming of microcontrollers is not enabled.
Programming of microcontrollers is enabled.
Debugging of microcontrollers is not enabled.
Debugging of microcontrollers is enabled.

register.name: DGI_INTERFACES
register.caption: DGI interfaces
register.description: DGI interface select bits.

value.description: The DGI GPIO interface is not enabled.
The DGI GPIO interface is enabled.
The DGI USART interface is not enabled.
The DGI USART interface is enabled.
The DGI UART interface is not enabled.
The DGI UART interface is enabled.
The DGI SPI interface is not enabled.
The DGI SPI interface is enabled.
The DGI I2C interface is not enabled.
The DGI I2C interface is enabled.
DGI GPIO line 0 is disabled.
DGI GPIO line 0 is enabled.
DGI GPIO line 1 is disabled.
DGI GPIO line 1 is enabled.
DGI GPIO line 2 is disabled.
DGI GPIO line 2 is enabled.
DGI GPIO line 3 is disabled.
DGI GPIO line 3 is enabled.

register.name: I2C_ADDR_0
register.caption: I2C address
register.description: I2C address to respond to.

register.name: I2C_ADDR_1
register.caption: Alt. I2C address
register.description: Alternative I2C address to respond to.

register.name: ANALOG_FEATURES
register.caption: Analog features
register.description: Board analog functionality.

value.description: The debugger can not set the target voltage.
The debugger can set the target voltage.
The debugger can not read the target voltage.
The debugger can read the target voltage.
There are no level shifters connected between the debugger and target, the debugger does not use level shifter direction pins.
There are level shifters connected between the debugger and target, the debugger actively use level shifter direction pins.

register.name: VMIN
register.caption: Min voltage
register.description:
Minimum operating voltage of the kit in deciVolt. Set this voltage to the minimum voltage of the target microcontroller, level shifters and voltage regulator.
example: 16 --> 16dV * 100 = 1600mV = 1.6V

register.name: VMAX
register.caption: Max voltage
register.description:
Maximum operating voltage of the kit in deciVolt. Set this voltage to the maximum voltage of the target microcontroller, level shifters and voltage regulator.
example: 50 --> 50dV * 100 = 5000mV = 5.0V

register.name: VTG
register.caption: Default voltage
register.description:
Default operating voltage of the kit in deciVolt.
example: 33 --> 33dV * 100 = 3300mV = 3.3V

register.name: VREG
register.caption: Voltage regulator
register.description: Tells the debugger which target microcontroller power supply solution is implemented on the board.

value.name: NO_ADJUST
value.caption: Not adjustable
value.description: The debugger is not able to adjust the target voltage.

value.name: DAC_FEEDBACK_CTRL_0
value.caption: DAC0 feedback manipulation
value.description: The debugger adjusts the target voltage by manipulating the feedback pin of the voltage regulator using DAC0. R1 = 47000Ω, R2 = 27000Ω, RDAC = 33000Ω, Vadj_regulator = 1.25V
ID signal 1 for extension 1 is disabled.
ID signal 1 for extension 1 is enabled.
ID signal 2 for extension 2 is disabled.
ID signal 2 for extension 2 is enabled.
ID signal 3 for extension 3 is disabled.
ID signal 3 for extension 3 is enabled.
ID signal 4 for extension 4 is disabled.
ID signal 4 for extension 4 is enabled.

register.name: LABS
register.caption: Lab features
register.description: Lab features enabled.

register.name: KITNAME
register.caption: Kit name
register.description: The product name.

register.name: MNFRNAME
register.caption: Manufacturer
register.description: The manufacturer name, e.g Microchip.

register.name: DEVNAME
register.caption: Target name
register.description: The name of the target device, as written in MPLAB / Studio.

register.name: SERNUM
register.caption: Serial Number
register.description: Product serial number.

register.name: REDIRECT
register.caption: redirectID
register.description: HTML redirect ID

register.name: DATE
register.caption: Manufacturing date
register.description: Manufacturing date stamp. ASCII: YYYYMMDD

register.name: KEY1_TYPE
register.caption: Key 1 type
register.description: Defines what the content of the KEY1 register is

value.caption: No content type is defined
value.name: NONE
value.description: Content of the KEY1 register is undefined

value.caption: MAC48
value.name: MAC48
value.description: The KEY1 register contains a 48-bit MAC address

value.caption: MAC64
value.name: MAC64
value.description: The KEY1 register contains a 64-bit MAC address

value.caption: GUID/UUID
value.name: GUID
value.description: The KEY1 register contains a 128-bit GUID/UUID

value.caption: UID
value.name: UID
value.description: The KEY1 register contains a UID

value.caption: PUBKEY
value.name: PUBKEY
value.description: They KEY1 register contains a raw public key from a CryptoAuthentication ATECCx08 device

register.name: KEY2_TYPE
register.caption: Key 2 type
register.description: Defines what the content of the KEY2 register is

value.caption: No content type is defined
value.name: NONE
value.description: Content of the KEY2 register is undefined

value.caption: MAC48
value.name: MAC48
value.description: The KEY2 register contains a 48-bit MAC address

value.caption: MAC64
value.name: MAC64
value.description: The KEY2 register contains a 64-bit MAC address

value.caption: UID
value.name: UID
value.description: The KEY2 register contains a UID

register.name: KEY3_TYPE
register.caption: Key 3 type
register.description: Defines what the content of the KEY3 register is

value.caption: No content type is defined
value.name: NONE
value.description: Content of the KEY3 register is undefined

value.caption: MAC48
value.name: MAC48
value.description: The KEY3 register contains a 48-bit MAC address

value.caption: MAC64
value.name: MAC64
value.description: The KEY3 register contains a 64-bit MAC address

value.caption: UID
value.name: UID
value.description: The KEY3 register contains a UID

register.name: KEY4_TYPE
register.caption: Key 4 type
register.description: Defines what the content of the KEY4 register is

value.caption: No content type is defined
value.name: NONE
value.description: Content of the KEY4 register is undefined

value.caption: MAC48
value.name: MAC48
value.description: The KEY4 register contains a 48-bit MAC address

value.caption: MAC64
value.name: MAC64
value.description: The KEY4 register contains a 64-bit MAC address

value.caption: UID
value.name: UID
value.description: The KEY4 register contains a UID

register.name: KEY1_LEN
register.caption: Key 1 length
register.description: Number of data bytes in the KEY1 register

register.name: KEY2_LEN
register.caption: Key 2 length
register.description: Number of data bytes in the KEY2 register

register.name: KEY3_LEN
register.caption: Key 3 length
register.description: Number of data bytes in the KEY3 register

register.name: KEY4_LEN
register.caption: Key 4 length
register.description: Number of data bytes in the KEY4 register

register.name: KEY1
register.caption: Key register 1
register.description: Generic 64-byte array register, content is described by the KEY1_TYPE register, data length in the KEY1_LEN register.

register.name: KEY2
register.caption: Key register 2
register.description: Generic 32-byte array register, content is described by the KEY2_TYPE register, data length in the KEY2_LEN register.

register.name: KEY3
register.caption: Key register 3
register.description: Generic 16-byte array register, content is described by the KEY3_TYPE register, data length in the KEY3_LEN register.

register.name: KEY4
register.caption: Key register 4
register.description: Generic 16-byte array register, content is described by the KEY4_TYPE register, data length in the KEY4_LEN register.
